messages.subject: Website
messages.msgSnippet: Just to let you all know I made a few changes to the home page including a different group shot a/k/a the photo we d all die to get our hands on if it really
messages.messageBody:
Just to let you all know I made a few changes to the home page including
a different "group shot" a/k/a the photo we'd all die to get our hands
on if it really existed. I _finally_ got the bright idea to put links to
the new additions in the newly added "what's new" space. I added the
first part of the filmography so if anyone has any comments on any of
the films you've seen please feel free to send them here or to me
personally to include.

--
Barbara Sheridan
http://www.barbarasheridan.net



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Website
messages.msgSnippet: I ve created the long-awaited website (still in progress): www.geocities.com/shieikandojo/seimon.html Check it out! --M. (a.k.a. Kondou)
messages.messageBody:
I've created the long-awaited website (still in progress):

www.geocities.com/shieikandojo/seimon.html

Check it out!

--M. (a.k.a. Kondou)
